name: urbanist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone whose job is to study and plan towns and cities: He's a developer who became an academic and urbanist. The green urbanists I've met are some of the most determined, practical people around.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a humanist, an urbanist and, above all, an artist.A group led by the French urbanist David Mangin was selected to lead the first phase of the project.The firm is hoping to develop an urbanist model more deeply connected to the spontaneity of everyday life.
